content: Lifestyle Family Education Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Jun 2019Any photo studios that offer graduation robe rental to recommend?My convocation is coming soon and i am wondering if there're studios for me to rent a graduation robe.2 answersAnswerBump1

Justin Kieran OngLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 02 Jun 2019Most schools usually partner with Broadway serangoon for gown rentals and at the sane time, Broadway usually has a promotion when you collect the convocation photos to pay $100 upfront for a 50% off your next photo session with them or something.I graduated 1 year ago and that was the deal at the time. May have changed.0 comments1
